refnamediv.refpurpose: Generates a Digital signature template based on a XML document.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: The function is used to generate dynamically a digital signature template containing references to be signed.

refsect2.title: tmpl
refsect2.para: a string containing base XML template

refsect2.title: wss_ver
refsect2.para: vector containing WS-Security and WS-Utility version URIs

refsect1.title: Return Types
refsect1.para:
On success the function will return a string containing a XML template suitable to pass to the xenc_encrypt
. The elements matching listed in elm-n
from namespace URIs in ns-n
and having Id attribute will be included in the XML signature reference list.
